question: The 2019 Nobel prize in physics has been awarded for discovery in which field?
explanation: The Nobel Prize 2019 for Physics has jointly been awarded to three scientists - James Peebles, Michel Mayor and Didier Queloz - groundbreaking discoveries about the evolution of the universe and the Earth\'s place in the cosmos. One half of the award was given to James Peebles for theoretical discoveries in physical cosmology and the other half jointly to Michel Mayor and Didier Queloz for the discovery of an exo-planet orbiting a solar-type star. They will share a 9-million kronor cash award, a gold medal and a diploma. The laureates will receive them at a ceremony in Stockholm on December 10.
